-		*		(A0*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
-		(A0*)		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
-		(R-A0*)		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
donate		*		*		*		*
-		(A1*)		*		*		*
-		(AM-LOC*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
-		*)		*)		*		*
applaud		*		*		*		*
-		*		(AM-TMP*		*		*
-		*		*		(A0*)		*
hear		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		(A1*		(A0*
-		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*)
-		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		*
execute		*		*		*		*
-		*		*		*		(A1*
-		*		*		*		*)
-		*		*		*		(A2*
-		*		*		*		*

-		*		*		*		*
-		*		*)		*)		*)
